verses.text: \w After|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w His|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w across|strong="G4008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Kidron|strong="G2748"\w* \w Valley|strong="G5493"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w garden|strong="G2779"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, stepped forward \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w*?”

“\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*,” \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w*.” \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w betrayer|strong="G3860"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w*,” \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w drew|strong="G2532"\w* \w back|strong="G3694"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w ground|strong="G5476"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, “\w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w*?” “\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*,” \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*.

“\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w He|strong="G3754"\w*,” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w looking|strong="G2212"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w*.”

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w fulfill|strong="G4137"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w He|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* lost \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w You|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w Me|strong="G1325"\w*.”\f + \fr 18:9 \ft See John 6:39 and John 17:12.\f*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w drew|strong="G1670"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w struck|strong="G3817"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest, cutting off \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w ear|strong="G5621"\w*. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w*’\w s|strong="G2192"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Malchus|strong="G3124"\w*.

“\w Put|strong="G1325"\w* \w your|strong="G1325"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w back|strong="G1519"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w its|strong="G1325"\w* \w sheath|strong="G2336"\w*!” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*. “\w Shall|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w cup|strong="G4221"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w has|strong="G3962"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w Me|strong="G1325"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w band|strong="G4686"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* soldiers, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* its \w commander|strong="G5506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w arrested|strong="G4815"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* Annas, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="G3995"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*.

\w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w advised|strong="G4823"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w better|strong="G4851"\w* \w if|strong="G3748"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G1520"\w* \w died|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*. Peter’s First Denial (Matthew 26:69–70; Mark 14:66–68; Luke 22:54–57)

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* following \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. \w Since|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* courtyard \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w outside|strong="G1854"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w door|strong="G2374"\w*. \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w doorkeeper|strong="G2377"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G1521"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w At|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G3588"\w* girl watching \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w door|strong="G2377"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, “Aren’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*’s \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*?” “\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w cold|strong="G5592"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* around \w a|strong="G2532"\w* charcoal fire \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G4160"\w* warm. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w warming|strong="G2328"\w* \w himself|strong="G2328"\w*. Jesus before the High Priest (Matthew 26:57–68; Mark 14:53–65; Luke 22:66–71)

Meanwhile, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priest \w questioned|strong="G2065"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w His|strong="G4012"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w His|strong="G4012"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w*.

“\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w openly|strong="G3954"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*,” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* answered. “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w come|strong="G4905"\w* \w together|strong="G4905"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w secret|strong="G2927"\w*.

\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w asking|strong="G2065"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*? \w Ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* heard \w My|strong="G3708"\w* message. Surely \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* \w nearby|strong="G3936"\w* slapped \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* face \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Is|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w how|strong="G3779"\w* \w You|strong="G1325"\w* answer \w the|strong="G1161"\w* high priest?”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* replied, “\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w something|strong="G5101"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w*, \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2980"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w correctly|strong="G2573"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w did|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w strike|strong="G1194"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* Annas sent \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, still \w bound|strong="G1210"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w the|strong="G4314"\w* high priest. Peter’s Second and Third Denials (Matthew 26:71–75; Mark 14:69–72; Luke 22:58–62)

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w still|strong="G2476"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w warming|strong="G2328"\w* \w himself|strong="G2328"\w*. \w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, “Aren’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*?” \w He|strong="G2532"\w* denied \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.”

\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* high priest’s \w servants|strong="G1401"\w*, \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w relative|strong="G4773"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G1520"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w ear|strong="G5621"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w cut|strong="G4074"\w* \w off|strong="G1537"\w*, \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “Didn’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w garden|strong="G2779"\w*?”

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* denied \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w once|strong="G3825"\w* \w more|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* rooster \w crowed|strong="G5455"\w*. Jesus before Pilate (Matthew 27:11–14; Luke 23:1–5)

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* away \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Praetorium|strong="G4232"\w*. \w By|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w early|strong="G4404"\w* \w morning|strong="G4404"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Jews \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Praetorium|strong="G4232"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* avoid \w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unable|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3767"\w*, “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G1438"\w* \w bringing|strong="G5342"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*?”

“\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* criminal,” \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w handed|strong="G3860"\w* \w Him|strong="G4160"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.”

“\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* own \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,” \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. “\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w permitted|strong="G1832"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* execute \w anyone|strong="G3762"\w*,” \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*.
